about_the_game:
Excalibur's Swordstone Idle Forge" is an engaging idle clicker game set in a captivating medieval fantasy world. The core gameplay revolves around the legendary tale of pulling swords from stones, and you'll step into the role of a skilled blacksmith on a quest to craft the most extraordinary weapons.



Features:

  • Stone Pedestal Clicking: Begin by tapping on stone pedestals to release swords, kickstarting your journey as a master swordsmith. Each sword brings you closer to amassing wealth and prestige.

  • Upgrade Your Forge: Use earned gold to improve your forge's efficiency, boosting the rate at which swords are produced. Enhance your craftsmanship, unlock new tools, and hire skilled assistants.

  • Expand Your Realm: Purchase additional stone pedestals to multiply your sword production. With each new pedestal, your earnings increase, creating a self-sustaining loop of wealth generation.

  • Faction Relations: Unlock and engage with various factions within the realm. Fulfill their special item requests using resources gained from selling swords. In return, receive substantial rewards that catapult your progress.

  • Artifact Crafting: As you fulfill faction requests, gather rare components to forge powerful artifacts. These unique creations can provide significant bonuses, propelling you even further in your quest for mastery.

  • Strategic Choices: Decide when to reinvest your gold into upgrades or purchase new stone pedestals. Balancing your resources optimally is key to reaching greater heights.

"Excalibur's Swordstone Idle Forge" combines the excitement of the legendary sword-in-the-stone motif with the addictive gameplay of an idle clicker. As you delve deeper into the world, the intricate web of upgrading, trading, and crafting keeps you engaged and motivated to become the ultimate master of the forge.
